description: This file is a frontend HTML page for visualizing and interacting with a database. It includes styled elements, JavaScript for fetching data from backend APIs, and dynamic DOM manipulation to display databases, tables, and data records.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches list of databases and displays them in the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the list of databases and resets selected states.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses a database to show its tables.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches and displays tables within a selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Loads and displays data records from a selected table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Builds HTML table from data array for display.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Creates table cell content, handling objects, long strings, and nulls.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses table cell to show full content.
